skills.skill: DEIA (Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Accessibility) Knowledge

duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate with faculty members, librarians, and instructional technologists/designers to design, develop, and implement OER to improve the affordability, accessibility, and diversity of course materials for twelve high-enrollment courses.
Support regular synchronous project coordination and collaboration with faculty and project teams based on the West Coast.
Consult with faculty and librarians at the grant partner campuses in Los Angeles and the Bay Area, CA.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Education, Instructional Design, or a related field (Master's preferred)
